articles.author: Alex Stedman
articles.title: Frankie Muniz Says He Walked Off Malcolm in the Middle for Two Episodes Over On-Set Tension - IGN
articles.description: Frankie Muniz has shed some light on tension on the set of Malcolm in the Middle, saying it caused him to walk off the set for two episodes: "Everyone was so afraid to stand up when certain people were controlling or rude or disrespectful."
articles.content:
Frankie Muniz has shed some light on a tense on-set environment on Malcolm in the Middle, saying he abstained from two episodes of the classic sitcom because of it.
Muniz is currently a contestant o… [+2971 chars]
